scripts.check: npm run check:schema && npm run check:docs
scripts.check:schema: npm run check:schema:ts && npm run check:schema:json && npm run check:schema:md
scripts.check:schema:json: for f in schema/*/schema.ts; do typescript-json-schema --defaultNumberType integer --required --skipLibCheck "$f" "*" | cat | cmp "${f%.ts}.json" - || exit 1; done
scripts.check:schema:md: for f in docs/specification/*/schema.mdx; do typedoc --entryPoints "schema/$(basename -- $(dirname -- "$f"))/schema.ts" | cmp "$f" - || exit 1; done
scripts.check:docs: npm run check:docs:format && npm run check:docs:links
scripts.generate:schema: npm run generate:schema:json && npm run generate:schema:md
scripts.generate:schema:json: for f in schema/*/schema.ts; do typescript-json-schema --defaultNumberType integer --required --skipLibCheck "$f" "*" -o "${f%.ts}.json"; done
scripts.generate:schema:md: for f in docs/specification/*/schema.mdx; do typedoc --entryPoints "schema/$(basename -- $(dirname -- "$f"))/schema.ts" > "$f"; done
